problem_names:
lemma weakCongSimI[case_names cTau]:
  fixes \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   C   :: "'d::fs_name"

  assumes rTau:  "\<And>Q'. \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto>\<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P'. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and> (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q"

lemma weakCongSimE:
  fixes F   :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q"
  and "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto>\<tau> \<prec> Q'"

  obtains P' where "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'" and "(\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel"

lemma weakCongSimClosedAux:
  fixes \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   p   :: "name prm"

  assumes EqvtRel: "eqvt Rel"
  and     PSimQ: "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q"

  shows "(p \<bullet> \<Psi>) \<rhd> (p \<bullet> P) \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> (p \<bullet> Q)"

lemma weakCongSimClosed:
  fixes \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   p   :: "name prm"

  assumes EqvtRel: "eqvt Rel"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q \<Longrightarrow> (p \<bullet> \<Psi>) \<rhd> (p \<bullet> P) \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> (p \<bullet> Q)"
  and   "P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q \<Longrightarrow> (p \<bullet> P) \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> (p \<bullet> Q)"

lemma weakCongSimReflexive:
  fixes Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes "{(\<Psi>, P, P) | \<Psi> P. True} \<subseteq> Rel"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> P"

lemma weakStepSimTauChain:
  fixes \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Q'  :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q'"
  and     "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q"
  and     Sim: "\<And>\<Psi> P Q. (\<Psi>, P, Q) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto><Rel> Q"
  
  obtains P' where "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'" and "(\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel"

lemma weakCongSimTransitive:
  fixes \<Psi>     :: 'b
  and   P      :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel    :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q      :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel'   :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   T      :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel''  :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"

  assumes PRelQ: "(\<Psi>, P, Q) \<in> Rel"
  and     PSimQ: "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q"
  and     QSimR: "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel'\<guillemotright> R"
  and     Set: "{(\<Psi>, P, R) | \<Psi> P R. \<exists>Q. (\<Psi>, P, Q) \<in> Rel \<and> (\<Psi>, Q, R) \<in> Rel'} \<subseteq> Rel''"
  and     Sim: "\<And>\<Psi> P Q. (\<Psi>, P, Q) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto><Rel> Q"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel''\<guillemotright> R"

lemma weakCongSimStatEq:
  fixes \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   \<Psi>'  :: 'b

  assumes PSimQ: "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q"
  and     "\<Psi> \<simeq> \<Psi>'"
  and     C1: "\<And>\<Psi> P Q \<Psi>'. \<lbrakk>(\<Psi>, P, Q) \<in> Rel; \<Psi> \<simeq> \<Psi>'\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> (\<Psi>', P, Q) \<in> Rel'"

  shows "\<Psi>' \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel'\<guillemotright> Q"

lemma weakCongSimMonotonic: 
  fixes \<Psi> :: 'b
  and   P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   A :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   B :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>A\<guillemotright> Q"
  and     "A \<subseteq> B"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>B\<guillemotright> Q"

lemma strongSimWeakCongSim:
  fixes \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>[Rel] Q"
  and     "Rel \<subseteq> Rel'"
  
  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel'\<guillemotright> Q"
translations:
lemma weakCongSimI[case_names cTau]:
  fixes \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   C   :: "'d::fs_name"

  assumes rTau:  "\<And>Q'. \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto>\<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P'. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and> (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> ?Q' \<Longrightarrow>
  \<exists>P'.
     \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
     (\<Psi>, P', ?Q') \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q
by(auto simp add: weakCongSimulation_def)

lemma weakCongSimE:
  fixes F   :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q"
  and "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto>\<tau> \<prec> Q'"

  obtains P' where "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'" and "(\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'.
        \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';
         (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'.
        \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';
         (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by(auto simp add: weakCongSimulation_def)

lemma weakCongSimClosedAux:
  fixes \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   p   :: "name prm"

  assumes EqvtRel: "eqvt Rel"
  and     PSimQ: "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q"

  shows "(p \<bullet> \<Psi>) \<rhd> (p \<bullet> P) \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> (p \<bullet> Q)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet>
    \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                  P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> p \<bullet>
                             Q
proof(induct rule: weakCongSimI)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q'.
       p \<bullet>
       \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                     Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          p \<bullet>
          \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                        P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (p \<bullet> \<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel
case(cTau Q')

proof (state)
this:
  p \<bullet> \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q'.
       p \<bullet>
       \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                     Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          p \<bullet>
          \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                        P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (p \<bullet> \<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel
from \<open>p \<bullet> \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet> Q \<longmapsto>\<tau> \<prec> Q'\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  p \<bullet> \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q'
have "(rev p \<bullet> p \<bullet> \<Psi>) \<rhd> (rev p \<bullet> p \<bullet> Q) \<longmapsto>(rev p \<bullet> (\<tau> \<prec> Q'))"

proof (prove)
using this:
  p \<bullet> \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rev p \<bullet>
    p \<bullet>
    \<Psi> \<rhd> rev p \<bullet>
                  p \<bullet>
                  Q \<longmapsto> rev p \<bullet> \<tau> \<prec> Q'
by(blast dest: semantics.eqvt)

proof (state)
this:
  rev p \<bullet>
  p \<bullet>
  \<Psi> \<rhd> rev p \<bullet>
                p \<bullet>
                Q \<longmapsto> rev p \<bullet> \<tau> \<prec> Q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q'.
       p \<bullet>
       \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                     Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          p \<bullet>
          \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                        P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (p \<bullet> \<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel
hence "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto>\<tau> \<prec> (rev p \<bullet> Q')"

proof (prove)
using this:
  rev p \<bullet>
  p \<bullet>
  \<Psi> \<rhd> rev p \<bullet>
                p \<bullet>
                Q \<longmapsto> rev p \<bullet> \<tau> \<prec> Q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> rev p \<bullet> Q'
by(simp add: eqvts)

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> rev p \<bullet> Q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q'.
       p \<bullet>
       \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                     Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          p \<bullet>
          \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                        P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (p \<bullet> \<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel
with PSimQ

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> rev p \<bullet> Q'
obtain P' where PChain: "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'" and P'RelQ': "(\<Psi>, P', rev p \<bullet> Q') \<in> Rel"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> rev p \<bullet> Q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'.
        \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';
         (\<Psi>, P', rev p \<bullet> Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by(blast dest: weakCongSimE)

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'
  (\<Psi>, P', rev p \<bullet> Q') \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q'.
       p \<bullet>
       \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                     Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          p \<bullet>
          \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                        P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (p \<bullet> \<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel
from PChain

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'
have "(p \<bullet> \<Psi>) \<rhd> (p \<bullet> P) \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> (p \<bullet> P')"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet>
    \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                  P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> p \<bullet> P'
by(rule tauStepChainEqvt)

proof (state)
this:
  p \<bullet>
  \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> p \<bullet> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q'.
       p \<bullet>
       \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                     Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          p \<bullet>
          \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                        P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (p \<bullet> \<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  p \<bullet>
  \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> p \<bullet> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q'.
       p \<bullet>
       \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                     Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          p \<bullet>
          \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                        P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (p \<bullet> \<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel
from P'RelQ' EqvtRel

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (\<Psi>, P', rev p \<bullet> Q') \<in> Rel
  eqvt Rel
have "(p \<bullet> (\<Psi>,  P', rev p \<bullet> Q')) \<in> Rel"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (\<Psi>, P', rev p \<bullet> Q') \<in> Rel
  eqvt Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> (\<Psi>, P', rev p \<bullet> Q') \<in> Rel
by(simp only: eqvt_def)

proof (state)
this:
  p \<bullet> (\<Psi>, P', rev p \<bullet> Q') \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q'.
       p \<bullet>
       \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                     Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          p \<bullet>
          \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                        P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (p \<bullet> \<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel
hence "(p \<bullet> \<Psi>, p \<bullet> P', Q') \<in> Rel"

proof (prove)
using this:
  p \<bullet> (\<Psi>, P', rev p \<bullet> Q') \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p \<bullet> \<Psi>, p \<bullet> P', Q') \<in> Rel
by(simp add: eqvts)

proof (state)
this:
  (p \<bullet> \<Psi>, p \<bullet> P', Q') \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q'.
       p \<bullet>
       \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                     Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          p \<bullet>
          \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                        P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (p \<bullet> \<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  p \<bullet>
  \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> p \<bullet> P'
  (p \<bullet> \<Psi>, p \<bullet> P', Q') \<in> Rel
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  p \<bullet>
  \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> p \<bullet> P'
  (p \<bullet> \<Psi>, p \<bullet> P', Q') \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>P'.
       p \<bullet>
       \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
       (p \<bullet> \<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>P'.
     p \<bullet>
     \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
     (p \<bullet> \<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma weakCongSimClosed:
  fixes \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   p   :: "name prm"

  assumes EqvtRel: "eqvt Rel"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q \<Longrightarrow> (p \<bullet> \<Psi>) \<rhd> (p \<bullet> P) \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> (p \<bullet> Q)"
  and   "P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q \<Longrightarrow> (p \<bullet> P) \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> (p \<bullet> Q)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q \<Longrightarrow>
     p \<bullet>
     \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                   P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> p \<bullet>
                              Q) &&&
    (P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q \<Longrightarrow>
     p \<bullet>
     P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> p \<bullet> Q)
using EqvtRel

proof (prove)
using this:
  eqvt Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q \<Longrightarrow>
     p \<bullet>
     \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                   P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> p \<bullet>
                              Q) &&&
    (P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q \<Longrightarrow>
     p \<bullet>
     P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> p \<bullet> Q)
by(force dest: weakCongSimClosedAux simp add: permBottom)+

lemma weakCongSimReflexive:
  fixes Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes "{(\<Psi>, P, P) | \<Psi> P. True} \<subseteq> Rel"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> P"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> P
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  {(\<Psi>, P, P) |\<Psi> P. True} \<subseteq> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> P
by(auto simp add: weakCongSimulation_def dest: rtrancl_into_rtrancl)

lemma weakStepSimTauChain:
  fixes \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Q'  :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q'"
  and     "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q"
  and     Sim: "\<And>\<Psi> P Q. (\<Psi>, P, Q) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto><Rel> Q"
  
  obtains P' where "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'" and "(\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'.
        \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';
         (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'.
        \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';
         (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
assume A: "\<And>P'. \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'; (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> thesis"

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> ?P';
   (\<Psi>, ?P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> thesis

goal (1 subgoal):

lemma weakCongSimTransitive:
  fixes \<Psi>     :: 'b
  and   P      :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel    :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q      :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel'   :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   T      :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel''  :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"

  assumes PRelQ: "(\<Psi>, P, Q) \<in> Rel"
  and     PSimQ: "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q"
  and     QSimR: "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel'\<guillemotright> R"
  and     Set: "{(\<Psi>, P, R) | \<Psi> P R. \<exists>Q. (\<Psi>, P, Q) \<in> Rel \<and> (\<Psi>, Q, R) \<in> Rel'} \<subseteq> Rel''"
  and     Sim: "\<And>\<Psi> P Q. (\<Psi>, P, Q) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto><Rel> Q"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel''\<guillemotright> R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel''\<guillemotright> R
proof(induct rule: weakCongSimI)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q'.
       \<Psi> \<rhd> R \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel''
case(cTau R')

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> R \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> R'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q'.
       \<Psi> \<rhd> R \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel''
from QSimR \<open>\<Psi> \<rhd> R \<longmapsto>\<tau> \<prec> R'\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel'\<guillemotright> R
  \<Psi> \<rhd> R \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> R'
obtain Q' where QChain: "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q'" and Q'RelR': "(\<Psi>, Q', R') \<in> Rel'"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel'\<guillemotright> R
  \<Psi> \<rhd> R \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> R'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>Q'.
        \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q';
         (\<Psi>, Q', R') \<in> Rel'\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by(blast dest: weakCongSimE)

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q'
  (\<Psi>, Q', R') \<in> Rel'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q'.
       \<Psi> \<rhd> R \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel''
from QChain PSimQ Sim

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q'
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q
  (?\<Psi>, ?P, ?Q) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow>
  ?\<Psi> \<rhd> ?P \<leadsto><Rel> ?Q
obtain P' where PChain: "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'" and P'RelQ': "(\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q'
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q
  (?\<Psi>, ?P, ?Q) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow>
  ?\<Psi> \<rhd> ?P \<leadsto><Rel> ?Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'.
        \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';
         (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by(rule weakStepSimTauChain)

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'
  (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q'.
       \<Psi> \<rhd> R \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel''
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'
  (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q'.
       \<Psi> \<rhd> R \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel''
from P'RelQ' Q'RelR' Set

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel
  (\<Psi>, Q', R') \<in> Rel'
  {(\<Psi>, P, R) |\<Psi> P R.
   \<exists>Q. (\<Psi>, P, Q) \<in> Rel \<and> (\<Psi>, Q, R) \<in> Rel'}
  \<subseteq> Rel''
have "(\<Psi>, P', R') \<in> Rel''"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel
  (\<Psi>, Q', R') \<in> Rel'
  {(\<Psi>, P, R) |\<Psi> P R.
   \<exists>Q. (\<Psi>, P, Q) \<in> Rel \<and> (\<Psi>, Q, R) \<in> Rel'}
  \<subseteq> Rel''

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Psi>, P', R') \<in> Rel''
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  (\<Psi>, P', R') \<in> Rel''

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q'.
       \<Psi> \<rhd> R \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel''
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'
  (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel
  (\<Psi>, P', R') \<in> Rel''
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'
  (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel
  (\<Psi>, P', R') \<in> Rel''

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>P'.
       \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
       (\<Psi>, P', R') \<in> Rel''
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>P'.
     \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
     (\<Psi>, P', R') \<in> Rel''

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma weakCongSimStatEq:
  fixes \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   \<Psi>'  :: 'b

  assumes PSimQ: "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> Q"
  and     "\<Psi> \<simeq> \<Psi>'"
  and     C1: "\<And>\<Psi> P Q \<Psi>'. \<lbrakk>(\<Psi>, P, Q) \<in> Rel; \<Psi> \<simeq> \<Psi>'\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> (\<Psi>', P, Q) \<in> Rel'"

  shows "\<Psi>' \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel'\<guillemotright> Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi>' \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel'\<guillemotright> Q
proof(induct rule: weakCongSimI)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q'.
       \<Psi>' \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          \<Psi>' \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (\<Psi>', P', Q') \<in> Rel'
case(cTau Q')

this:
  \<Psi>' \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q'

 1. \<And>Q'.
       \<Psi>' \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          \<Psi>' \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (\<Psi>', P', Q') \<in> Rel'
from \<open>\<Psi>' \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto>\<tau> \<prec> Q'\<close> \<open>\<Psi> \<simeq> \<Psi>'\<close>

picking this:
  \<Psi>' \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q'
  \<Psi> \<simeq> \<Psi>'
have "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto>\<tau> \<prec> Q'"

using this:
  \<Psi>' \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q'
  \<Psi> \<simeq> \<Psi>'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q'
by(metis statEqTransition AssertionStatEqSym)

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q'

 1. \<And>Q'.
       \<Psi>' \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          \<Psi>' \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
          (\<Psi>', P', Q') \<in> Rel'
with PSimQ

  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q'

        \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';
         (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by(blast dest: weakCongSimE)

this:

  (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel

lemma weakCongSimMonotonic: 
  fixes \<Psi> :: 'b
  and   P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   A :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   B :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>A\<guillemotright> Q"
  and     "A \<subseteq> B"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>B\<guillemotright> Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>B\<guillemotright> Q
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>A\<guillemotright> Q
  A \<subseteq> B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>B\<guillemotright> Q
by(simp (no_asm) add: weakCongSimulation_def) (blast dest: weakCongSimE)+

lemma strongSimWeakCongSim:
  fixes \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>[Rel] Q"
  and     "Rel \<subseteq> Rel'"
  
  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel'\<guillemotright> Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel'\<guillemotright> Q
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>[Rel] Q
  Rel \<subseteq> Rel'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel'\<guillemotright> Q
apply(auto simp add: simulation_def weakCongSimulation_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Q'.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>\<alpha> Q'.
                   \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto> \<alpha> \<prec> Q' \<longrightarrow>
                   bn \<alpha> \<sharp>* \<Psi> \<longrightarrow>
                   bn \<alpha> \<sharp>* P \<longrightarrow>
                   (\<exists>P'.
                       \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<longmapsto> \<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and>
                       (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel);
        Rel \<subseteq> Rel';
        \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> Q'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P'.
                            \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<and>
                            (\<Psi>, P', Q') \<in> Rel'
by(erule_tac x=\<tau> in allE) fastforce
end
end
